commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Next up is archery! I'm feeling pretty good about this one! I've picked up what to do from watching Umi.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Japanese archery and western archery are different. This one's western.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: They're that different?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, from the way the bows are made down to the clothing and the basis for scoring.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: In western archery, you get more points the closer your arrow lands to the center target. That means whoever gets the most points wins.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yup, that's right. Hitting the bullseye is five points, and then for the outward rings, it goes four, three, two, one. If you miss, zero points. We each get three arrows! Aim for a high score!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru, Rina, Setsuna, Rin
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: La la la la la!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: First up is Rin, but...will she be all right?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Just like in Japanese archery, you need to have high concentration and a steady force of will. Right now, I would say Rin's...not overly excited or anything.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: The game may be different, but you're still using a bow to shoot arrows. Here I go... Hah!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Ooh! She hit a bullseye right away! Five points, zura!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Giggle* And I'll hit it again. Let me just aim carefully.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Achoo!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Rina got seven points. You're in second place for now.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hmph... That was harder than I thought... Rina-chan Board says, "Hangs head."

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But it's amazing that you could hit the target three times.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Rin sneezed and missed it on her second and third tries.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Next up is Setsu. Hmm? Setsu? What are you doing all the way over there? It's your turn!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Exhale* Let my arrow fly true... From a heart free of trepidation, with not a thing in my way... Fly!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Wait, what? What was that just now?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I think she was channeling some anime character. The character she... What's the word, ults? Her favorite from this anime season fights with a bow and arrow.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Set my soul aflame and bring light to the dark abyss! Diamond Crystal Arrow!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ugh, even my arrow enchanted with diamond crystal protective magic still isn't enough! Then how about this? Go, scarlet flash! Garnet Ruby Arrow!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Uh, I feel like people are starting to stop and stare. Maybe it's just my imagination.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: It's not, zura. I feel it too... Everyone on this floor is gathering here, zura!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: This is the finishing blow! Lightning of hope! Rainbow Tourmaline Arrow!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You're shouting too loudly, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The winner of the archery battle is...Setsuna Yuki!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Congratulations, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Wow! All three arrows hit the bullseye, zura!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: All the other guests applauded you, too. We were all so into it!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you. But I wasn't alone in my victory. It was my friends believing in me and the hopes they placed on this bow that gave me the strength to push past my limits.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Setsuna, come back to us.
